item.title: Wrist Support Band
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Select beige material for softer support. The black band is intended for a more firm support for those especially painful injuries. The loop makes it easier to put on the band for those with arthritis or other issues limiting your ability.

The post Wrist Support Band appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Aids in the healing of injured wrists
  • Made of power elastic for total support
  • One size fits all, ideal for work or sports
  • Easily adjusted, convenient

item.title: Athletic Injury Compression Wrap
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Provides moderate support and compression to muscles without constricting breathing or muscle growth, while neoprene fabric keeps muscles warm and pliable to reduce strain and hasten recovery. Indicated for strains, cramps, pulls, and sciatica. Great for use at work or on the athletic field.

The post Athletic Injury Compression Wrap appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
This Athletic Supporter is designed to protect, lift, support and hold the testes against the body. This prevents strain on the cords and muscles during activity, helping to eliminate discomfort, and keeps them away from injury, providing unobtrusive yet consistent support for a long day of work or for vigorous sports. For correct sizing, measure the abdomen between the hips and waist. 3 inch elastic waistband retains elasticity while minimizing curling at the top and bottom. Soft knit cotton/rayon pouch gives total support. Non-roll, tubular elastic leg straps help prevent binding, wrinkling or rolling, Mesh pouch

Features:

  • 3 inch elastic waistband
  • Soft knit cotton -rayon mesh pouch
  • Non-roll, tubular elastic straps
  • Excellent supporter
  • Wash in mild suds and rinse several times in clear water to clean
  • Roll in towel to absorb moisture and dry flat
  • Do not iron
  • Do not use dryer
  • Latex free

Specifications:

  • Item Type: Athletic Jock Supporter
  • Material: Soft knit cotton -rayon mesh pouch
  • Function: Protect, lift, support and hold the testes against the body
  • Color: White
  • Washable: Wash in mild suds and rinse several times in clear water to clean
  • Iron: Do not iron
  • Weigh: 3.75 oz
  • Dimensions: 4 x 1.25 x 9 in

    • Size

  • Size Available
  • Small, Medium, Large, XL

    • The post Athletic Injury Compression Wrap appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Slip On Wrist Compression Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• Specially designed for increased wrist support during sports training for enhanced athletic performance
  • Use for cycling, basketball, softball, baseball, football, soccer, volleyball, running, rugby, walking and other high intensity sports training
  • These wrist sleeves can be worn in all weather conditions
  • Moisture wicking microfiber helps to keep the skin cool and dry
  • Machine washable on gentle cycle. Do not use bleach or fabric softeners
  • One sleeve per order

The post Slip On Wrist Compression Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Targeted compression reduces muscle oscillation and vibration upon contact, providing stability to the muscle to help prevent micro-trauma, resulting in a faster and easier recovery, while compression to the wrist gives the delicate joint area maximum support right where you need it, without being restrictive.

The Lycra blend fiber gives in a gentle two-way stretch for comfortable, non-restrictive support using moderate compression which aids more efficient circulation, increases oxygen and reduces muscle fatigue.

Wrist Circumference Brace Size
5.5″ – 6.5″ Small
6.5″ – 7.5″ Medium
7.5″ – 8.5″ Large
8.5″ – 9.5″ Extra Large
9.5″ – 10.5″ 2XL

Interested in the benefits of compression for athletes? Check out our page on compression!

The post Slip On Wrist Compression Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Wrist Brace With Contoured Splint
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
For treatment of carpal tunnel syndrome, mild to moderate wrist sprain, arthritic pain, or following cast removal. The glove provides support and compression to the wrist, wicking away moisture for long term wearing comfort. The anatomically designed metal splint prevents painful wrist flexion, and holds the wrist in a neutral position to promote healing.

The post Wrist Brace With Contoured Splint appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Provides support and compression
  • Holds the wrist in a neutral position
  • Wicks away moisture

The post Wrist Brace With Contoured Splint appeared first on AT Surgical.
